phrase_text_1: Books are the ships of thoughts, wandering through the waves of time.
phrase_text_2: A book is a noble teacher, the main source of knowledge and spiritual growth.
phrase_text_3: If you enter diligently into the books of wisdom, then you shall discover great benefit for your soul.
phrase_text_4: Books delight us through and through, they converse with us, they give us good advice; they become living and lively companions to us .
phrase_text_5: All that I know about my life, it seems, I have learned in books.
phrase_text_6: The only way to become a 'cultured' person - is by reading.
phrase_text_7: Conversation would be vastly improved by the constant use of four simple words: I do not know.
phrase_text_8: Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
phrase_text_9: Logic is the god of those who think.
phrase_text_10: What we know is not much. What we do not know is immense

books_already_read: Chosen book have already been read
incorrect_period: Training period should be greater than 1 day and must not exceed 31 days
training_in_progress: Training is in progress. Try again after completing current training
precede_start: Results date may not precede training start date
greater_finish: Results date is greater than training finish date
today_yesterday: Results date should be today or yesterday
exceed_count: Provided pages count exceeds number of unread pages
book_err_title1: Book title must be at least 1 character long
book_err_title2: Book title should be less than 50 characters long
book_err_title3: The field cannot begin with space or dash
book_err_author1: Author's Name must be at least 1 character long
book_err_author2: Author's Name should be less than 50 characters long
book_err_author3: The field cannot begin with space or dash
book_err_year3: Year should be less than current year
book_err_pages3: Must be no more than 4 characters long
book__add__message2: Missing required fields or the field did not pass validation
results_err1: You cannot enter a date earlier than Training start date
results_err5: Pages number should be no more than 3 characters long
